subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Amy Yang of South Korea won the title in Annika Sorenstam’s finale on home turf, tying the course record with a nine-under 63 for a six-shot victory at the Scandinavian TPC in Stockholm. Sorenstam eagled the par-4 17th to move into second place. She double-bogeyed the last hole, hitting her tee shot into the water and three-putting. Sorenstam, the tournament host, shot 72 and finished seven back, tying for sixth in the rain-shortened 54-hole tournament.
snippet: Amy Yang of South Korea won the title in Annika Sorenstam’s finale on home turf, tying the course record with a nine-under 63 for a six-shot victory at the Scandinavian TPC in Stockholm. Sorenstam eagled the par-4 17th to move into second place....
